name: Froog (Visnyth)
description:
Froog, a frog with a mouth for a flashlight and... a rocket behind? Fly through the predator's beak and get the highest score you can!

Desc:  
Uh, basically flappy bird.

How to play the game:
Press "space" on your keyboard to fly. Position yourself properly to pass through the obstacles. Every 10 score you obtain, the light will get dimmer. Game's over when you hit the ceiling/floor/beaks.

Bugs:
The UI's weird...
